subject: How to test focus without displaying the component
msgSnippet: Hi All, Is there any way by which we can test focus without displaying the component. All the swing utility methods returns false if the component is not
messageBody:
Hi All,

Is there any way by which we can test focus without displaying the
component. All the swing utility methods returns false if the component is
not actually showing and we are trying to avoid the actual show as it takes
lot of time.

Shailesh


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
